*notes: Child is the applicant (Me, myself and I) - MIAM exemption (13E-06)
body:
You and anyone else making this application are known as the applicant.

(i) The {applicants, select, 1{name} undefined{name} other{names}} should be as {applicants, select, 1{it appears} undefined{it appears} other{they appear}} on the birth certificate (including any middle names)
heading: {applicants, select, 1{Enter the applicant’s name} other{Enter the applicants’ names} undefined{Enter the applicant’s name}}
